TopicTitle: KSP Got on the Boys Life Magazine!

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if this should be on this subforum :I

As a boy scout (plus someone who pays for it), I receive a magazine called Boys Life, which has stuff about boy scouts, but also has a video game section. So, I checked it out. This month, they did a section on indie games, and what I saw in the computer corner was KSP.

Quoting from the magazine:

"Kerbal Space Program

The developers of this space simulation worked with NASA to create a realistic, detailed space game. If you want to experience building and piloting a rocket - or grabbing an asteroid - Kerbal is for you

boyslife.org/links/kerbal"

If you click the link, it takes you to a site filled with links from that months issue. If you scroll down and hit Kerbal Space Program simulation game, it takes you to KSP's website.

What do you think?

FYI, I'll have pictures soon
